article.title: U.S. Army Buys C4 Infrastructure Materials for Afghanistan
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Communications Supply Corporation, Clarksburg, Maryland, was awarded a $20,360,218 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of command, control, communication and computer infrastructure materials. Work will be performed in Bagram, Afghanistan, with an estimated completion date of October 31, 2011. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Rock Island, Illinois, is the contracting activity.
